activities: Seapine Software transfers data from the EU primarily for employee benefit and service administration, human resource management, and general corporate business processes. Limited customer data is transferred from the EU for product registration, support, internal sales, marketing, and data processing.  Personal data from some of our customers, their European subsidiaries, their business partners and customers is transferred to the US for processing messaging and data exchanges between and among European entities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
